availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: A. Reynolds (Caldwell County, KY, hotel keeper)

body.p: Princeton, Caldwell County, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Virginia native. Hotel keeper in Princeton in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 112.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 218A.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Caldwell County Administration Bonds, 1878-1899 (Accessed through ancestry.com on December 10, 2019), p. 477.
